SequenceID.LongName: This is the number of the sequence
SequenceID.Description: [Repeat, Alternate, Pairs, Quadruplets, Pairs+Alt, Shrinking, Complex]

StimPosition.Description: The position of item (sound) in the 16-item sequence

StimID.Description: A or B, according to if the sound is low pitch or high pitch

ViolationOrNot.Description: Does the trial correspond to a deviant or not ?
ViolationOrNot.LongName: Is the trial a deviant ? 0 - No, 1 - Yes

Complexity.Description: The complexity of the sequence provided by the LoT

ViolationInSequence.Description: Does the whole presented 16 item sequence contain a violation ?
ViolationInSequence.LongName: Is there a violation in the sequence ?
